pack.name: AI Conference Circuit
pack.tagline: Pharma leaders who presented at major AI conferences in 2025
pack.description: 15 pharma and biotech leaders who presented at AWS re:Invent, NVIDIA GTC, and Bio-IT World in 2025. These are the decision-makers driving AI adoption â€” verified speakers with session links.
pack.targetBuyer: AI/ML platforms for drug discovery, lab informatics vendors, cloud services targeting pharma R&D

companies.talkTitle: Keynote: Three Takeaways from Pfizer's AI Transformation
companies.signalDetail: Lidia Fonseca presented in Adam Selipsky's keynote on Pfizer's 17 generative AI use cases with $750M-$1B projected savings. VOX internal GenAI platform deployed.

companies.talkTitle: From Lab to Market: AstraZeneca's Enterprise-Wide AI Success Story
companies.signalDetail: Featured session on enterprise AI deployment across R&D and commercial. James Weatherall leads data science strategy.

people.name: James Weatherall
people.title: VP, Head of Enterprise Data Enablement & Chief Data Scientist

companies.talkTitle: Novartis's Next-gen Data Platform Enables AI Drug Development
companies.signalDetail: Session on building next-generation data platforms for AI-driven drug development. Shared architecture patterns for scaling ML in pharma.

companies.talkTitle: Multiple sessions on clinical data management and AI
companies.signalDetail: Featured in Matt Garman's keynote at re:Invent. Shashidar Abbidi presented on clinical data management at Bio-IT World.

companies.talkTitle: AI Drug Discovery and Agentic AI Standards
companies.signalDetail: Richard Bonneau leads Genentech's AI drug discovery. Genentech is seed funder of Pistoia Alliance Agentic AI initiative.

people.name: Richard Bonneau
people.title: VP & Global Head of AI Drug Discovery

companies.signalDetail: Hans Bitter quoted in AISB/OpenFold3 consortium announcement. Takeda contributing structural data for federated AI model training.

people.name: Hans Bitter
people.title: Head of Computational Science and Data Strategy

companies.talkTitle: Generative AI Applications in Life Sciences
companies.signalDetail: Jonathan Amar presenting on generative AI applications at Verily, Alphabet's life sciences arm.

people.name: Jonathan Z. Amar
people.title: Senior Applied AI Scientist, Generative AI

companies.signalDetail: Brandon Allgood, founder of AAIH (Alliance for AI in Healthcare), presenting on AI-driven discovery platform.
Rody Arantes presenting on digital technology strategy spanning scientific compute and data governance.

companies.talkTitle: Computational Chemistry and AI Structure Prediction
companies.signalDetail: Paul Mortenson quoted: 'At Astex we see structural biology and computation as inseparable in modern drug discovery.'

people.name: Paul Mortenson
people.title: Senior Director, Computational Chemistry and Informatics

companies.talkTitle: Founding member of AI Structural Biology Network
companies.signalDetail: AbbVie is a founding member of AISB consortium alongside J&J, contributing proprietary structural data for federated AI training.

companies.talkTitle: Founding member of AI Structural Biology Network
companies.signalDetail: J&J is a founding member of AISB consortium alongside AbbVie. Leading federated learning for protein structure prediction.
